   19: 
   20: -module(escript_SUITE).
   21: -export([
   22: 	 all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 init_per_testcase/2,
   25: 	 end_per_testcase/2,
   26: 	 basic/1,
   27: 	 errors/1,
   28: 	 strange_name/1,
   29: 	 emulator_flags/1,
   30: 	 emulator_flags_no_shebang/1,
   31: 	 two_lines/1,
   32: 	 module_script/1,
   33: 	 beam_script/1,
   34: 	 legacy_archive_script/1,
   35: 	 archive_script/1,
   36: 	 epp/1,
   37: 	 create_and_extract/1,
   38: 	 overflow/1,
   39: 	 verify_sections/4,
   40:          unicode/1,
   41:          bad_io_server/1,
   42:          bypass_unicode_conversion/1
   43: 	]).
   44: 
   45: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   46: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   47: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   52: 
   53: all() -> 
   54:     [basic, errors, strange_name, emulator_flags,
   55:      emulator_flags_no_shebang, two_lines,
   56:      module_script, beam_script,
   57:      legacy_archive_script, archive_script,
   58:      epp, create_and_extract, overflow,
   59:      unicode, bad_io_server,
   60:      bypass_unicode_conversion].
   61: 
   62: groups() ->
   63:     [].
   64: 
   65: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   69:     ok.
   70: 
   71: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   81:     ok.
   82: 
   83: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   84: 
   85: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   87:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
   88:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial 5",
   89: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
   90:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile 10",
   91: 	<<"factorial 10 = 3628800\nExitCode:0">>),
   92:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile_main 7",
   93: 	<<"factorial 7 = 5040\nExitCode:0">>),
   94:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_warning 20",
   95:         [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
   96:                     "%   12| bar() ->\n"
   97:                     "%     | ^\n\n"
   98:                     "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\n"
   99:                     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  100:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-i", "factorial_warning 20",
  101:                   [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  102:                               "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\nExitCode:0">>]),
  103:     Warnings = [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  104:                            "%   12| bar() ->\n"
  105:                            "%     | ^\n\n"
  106:                            "ExitCode:0">>],
  107:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  108:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s -i", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  109:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-c -s", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  110:     run(Config, Dir, "filesize "++filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),"filesize"),
  111: 	[data_dir,<<"filesize:11:1: Warning: function id/1 is unused\n"
  112:                     "%   11| id(I) -> I.\n"
  113:                     "%     | ^\n"
  114:                     "\n"
  115:                     "324\n"
  116:                     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  117:     run(Config, Dir, "test_script_name",
  118: 	[data_dir,<<"test_script_name\nExitCode:0">>]),
  119:     run(Config, Dir, "tail_rec 1000",
  120: 	[<<"ok\nExitCode:0">>]),
  121: 
  122:     %% We expect the trap_exit flag for the process to be false,
  123:     %% since that is the default state for newly spawned processes.
  124:     run(Config, Dir, "trap_exit",
  125: 	<<"false\nExitCode:0">>),
  126:     ok.
  127: 
  128: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  129: 
  130: errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  132:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  133:     run(Config, Dir, "compile_error",
  134: 	[data_dir,<<"compile_error:5:12: syntax error before: '*'\n">>,
  135: 	 data_dir,<<"compile_error:8:9: syntax error before: blarf\n">>,
  136: 	 <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  137:     CompileErrors = [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n"
  138:                                 "%    6| main(Args) ->\n"
  139:                                 "%     | ^\n\n">>,
  140:                      data_dir,("lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n"
  141:                                "%    8|     halt(ExitCode).\n"
  142:                                "%     |          ^\n\n"),
  143:                      <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>],
  144:     run(Config, Dir, "lint_error", CompileErrors),
  145:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-i", "lint_error",
  146:                   [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n">>,
  147:                    data_dir,"lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n",
  148:                    <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  149:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "lint_error", CompileErrors),
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  153: 
  154: strange_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  156:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  157:     run(Config, Dir, "strange.name -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  158: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  159: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  163: 
  164: emulator_flags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  165:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  166:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  167:     run(Config, Dir, "emulator_flags -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  168: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  169: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  170: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  171: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  172: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  173: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  174:     ok.
  175: 
  176: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  177: 
  178: two_lines(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  179:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  180:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  181:     run(Config, Dir, "two_lines -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  182: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  183: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  184: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  185: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  189: 
  190: emulator_flags_no_shebang(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  192:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  193:     %% Need run_with_opts, to always use "escript" explicitly
  194:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", "emulator_flags_no_shebang -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  195: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  196: 		     "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  197: 		     "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  198: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  199: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  200: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  201:     ok.
  202: 
  203: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  204: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script
  205: %% Generate a new escript with a module header
  206: 
  207: module_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  208:     %% Read orig file
  209:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  210:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  211:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  212:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  213:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  214: 
  215:     %% Write source file
  216:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  217:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  218:     Base = "module_script",
  219:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  220:     ErlCode = ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  221: 	       "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  222: 	       string:join(Source, "\n"),
  223: 	       "\n"],
  224:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  225: 
  226: %%%%%%%
  227:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  228: 
  229:     %% With shebang
  230:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  231:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  232:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  233: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  234: 			  ErlCode]),
  235:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  236: 
  237:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  238: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  239: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  240: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  241: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  242: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  243: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  244: 
  245:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  246: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  247: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  248: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  249: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  250: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  251: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  252: 
  253:     %% Without shebang
  254:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  255:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  256:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  257: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  258: 			  ErlCode]),
  259:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  260: 
  261:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  262: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  263: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  264: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  265: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  266: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  267: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  268: 
  269:     %% Plain module without header
  270:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  271:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  272:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [ErlCode]),
  273:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  274: 
  275:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  276: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  277: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  278: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  279: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  280: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  281: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  282: 
  283: %%%%%%%
  284:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  285: 
  286:     %% With shebang
  287:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args_with_shebang",
  288:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  289:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  290: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  291: 			  Mode, "\n",
  292: 			  Flags, "\n",
  293: 			  ErlCode]),
  294:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  295: 
  296:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  297: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  298: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  299: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  300: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  301: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  302: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  303: 
  304:     ok.
  305: 
  306: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  307: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script and compile it.
  308: %% Generate a new escript containing the beam code and the escript header
  309: beam_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  310:     %% Read orig file
  311:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  312:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  313:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  314:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  315:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  316: 
  317:     %% Write source file
  318:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  319:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  320:     Base = "beam_script",
  321:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  322:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile,
  323: 			 ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  324: 			  "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  325: 			  string:join(Source, "\n"),
  326: 			  "\n"]),
  327: 
  328:     %% Compile the code
  329:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} = compile:file(ErlFile, [binary]),
  330: 
  331: %%%%%%%
  332:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  333: 
  334:     %% With shebang
  335:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  336:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  337:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  338: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  339: 			  BeamCode]),
  340:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  341: 
  342:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  343: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  344: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  345: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  346: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  347: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  348: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  349: 
  350:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  351: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  352: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  353: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  354: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  355: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  356: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  357: 
  358:     %% Without shebang
  359:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  360:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  361:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  362: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  363: 			  BeamCode]),
  364:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  365: 
  366:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  367: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  368: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  369: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  370: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  371: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  372: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  373: 
  374:     %% Plain beam file without header
  375:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  376:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  377:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [BeamCode]),
  378:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  379: 
  380:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  381: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  382: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  383: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  384: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  385: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  386: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  387: 
  388: %%%%%%%
  389:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  390: 
  391:     %% With shebang
  392:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args",
  393:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  394:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  395: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  396: 			  Mode, "\n",
  397: 			  Flags, "\n",
  398: 			  BeamCode]),
  399:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  400: 
  401:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  402: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  403: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  404: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  405: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  406: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  407: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  408:     ok.
  409: 
  410: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  411: %% Create an archive file containing two entire applications plus two
  412: %% alternate main modules. Generate a new escript containing the archive
  413: %% (with .app and .beam files and) and the escript header.
  414: %% Archives in this test have the pre-OTP-28 format.
  415: legacy_archive_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  416:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  417:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  418:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  419:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script.zip"]),
  420:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script"],
  421: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  422:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  423:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script"]),
  424: 
  425:     %% Compile the code
  426:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dict"),
  427:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dummy"),
  428:     {ok, MainFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  429:     ok = compile_files(MainFiles, TopDir, TopDir),
  430: 
  431:     %% Create the archive
  432:     {ok, TopFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  433:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} = zip:create(Archive, TopFiles,
  434: 				       [memory, {compress, []}, {cwd, TopDir}]),
  435: 
  436:     %% Read the source script
  437:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir, "emulator_flags"]),
  438:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  439:     [Shebang, Mode, _Flags | _Source] =
  440: 	string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  441:     Flags = "%%! -archive_script_dict foo bar"
  442: 	" -archive_script_dict foo"
  443: 	" -archive_script_dummy bar",
  444:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  445: 
  446: %%%%%%%
  447:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  448:     MainBase = "archive_script_main",
  449:     MainScript = filename:join([PrivDir, MainBase]),
  450: 
  451:     %% With shebang
  452:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  453: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  454: 			  Flags, "\n",
  455: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  456:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  457: 
  458:     run(Config, PrivDir, MainBase ++  " -legacy_arg1 arg2 arg3",
  459: 	[<<"main:[\"-legacy_arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  460: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  461: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  462: 	   "extract: ok\n"
  463: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  464: 
  465:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -legacy_arg1 arg2 arg3",
  466: 		  [<<"main:[\"-legacy_arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  467: 		     "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  468: 		     "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  469: 		     "extract: ok\n"
  470: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  471: 
  472:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_with_shebang"),
  473: 
  474:     %% Without shebang (no flags)
  475:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  476: 			 ["%% Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  477: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  478:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  479: 
  480:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -legacy_arg1 arg2 arg3",
  481: 		  [<<"main:[\"-legacy_arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  482: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  483: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  484: 		     "extract: ok\n"
  485: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  486:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_shebang"),
  487: 
  488:     %% Plain archive without header (no flags)
  489: 
  490:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript, [ArchiveBin]),
  491:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  492: 
  493:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -legacy_arg1 arg2 arg3",
  494: 		  [<<"main:[\"-legacy_arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  495: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  496: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  497: 		     "extract: ok\n"
  498: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  499:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_header"),
  500: 
  501: %%%%%%%
  502:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  503:     AltBase = "archive_script_alternate_main",
  504:     AltScript = filename:join([PrivDir, AltBase]),
  505:     ok = file:write_file(AltScript,
  506: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  507: 			  Mode, "\n",
  508: 			  Flags, " -escript main archive_script_main2\n",
  509: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  510:     ok = file:write_file_info(AltScript, OrigFI),
  511: 
  512:     run(Config, PrivDir, AltBase ++  " -legacy_arg1 arg2 arg3",
  513: 	[<<"main2:[\"-legacy_arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  514: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  515: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  516: 	   "extract: ok\n"
  517: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  518: 
  519:     ok.
  520: 
  521: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  522: %% Create an archive file containing two entire applications plus two
  523: %% alternate main modules. Generate a new escript containing the archive
  524: %% (with .app and .beam files and) and the escript header.
  525: %% Archives in this test have the new OTP-28 format.
  526: archive_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  527:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir.
  528:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  529:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  530:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script.zip"]),
  531:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script"],
  532: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  533:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  534:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script"]),
  535: 
  536:     %% Compile the code.
  537:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dict"),
  538:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dummy"),
  539:     {ok, MainFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  540:     ok = compile_files(MainFiles, TopDir, TopDir),
  541: 
  542:     %% Read the source script.
  543:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir, "emulator_flags"]),
  544:     Flags = "-archive_script_dict foo bar"
  545: 	" -archive_script_dict foo"
  546: 	" -archive_script_dummy bar",
  547:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  548: 
  549: %%%%%%%
  550:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags.
  551:     MainBase = "archive_script_main",
  552:     MainScript = filename:join([PrivDir, MainBase]),
  553: 
  554:     %% With shebang.
  555:     All = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(PrivDir, "archive_script/**")),
  556:     Beams = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(PrivDir, "**/*.beam")),
  557:     Files = [F || F <- All, filelib:is_regular(F)] -- Beams,
  558: 
  559:     ok = escript:create(MainScript, [shebang,
  560:                                      {emu_args, Flags},
  561:                                      {modules, Beams},
  562:                                      {files, Files}]),
  563:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  564: 
  565:     run(Config, PrivDir, MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  566:         [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  567:            "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  568:            "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  569:            "extract: ok\n"
  570:            "ExitCode:0">>]),
  571: 
  572:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  573:                   [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  574:                      "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  575:                      "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  576:                      "extract: ok\n"
  577:                      "ExitCode:0">>]),
  578: 
  579:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_with_shebang"),
  580: 
  581:     %% Without shebang (no flags).
  582:     ok = escript:create(MainScript, [{comment, "Something else than shebang!!!"},
  583:                                      {modules, Beams},
  584:                                      {files, Files}]),
  585:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  586: 
  587:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  588: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  589: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  590: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  591: 		     "extract: ok\n"
  592: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  593:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_shebang"),
  594: 
  595:     %% Plain archive without header (no flags).
  596: 
  597:     ok = escript:create(MainScript, [{modules, Beams}, {files, Files}]),
  598:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  599: 
  600:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  601: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  602: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  603: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  604: 		     "extract: ok\n"
  605: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  606:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_header"),
  607: 
  608: %%%%%%%
  609:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags.
  610:     AltBase = "archive_script_alternate_main",
  611:     AltScript = filename:join([PrivDir, AltBase]),
  612:     ok = escript:create(AltScript,
  613:                         [shebang,
  614:                          {comment, "-*- erlang -*-"},
  615:                          {emu_args, Flags ++ " -escript main archive_script_main2"},
  616:                          {modules, Beams},
  617:                          {files, Files}]),
  618:     ok = file:write_file_info(AltScript, OrigFI),
  619: 
  620:     run(Config, PrivDir, AltBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  621: 	[<<"main2:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  622: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  623: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  624: 	   "extract: ok\n"
  625: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  626: 
  627:     ok.
  628: 
  629: compile_app(TopDir, AppName) ->
  630:     AppDir = filename:join([TopDir, AppName]),
  631:     SrcDir = filename:join([AppDir, "src"]),
  632:     OutDir = filename:join([AppDir, "ebin"]),
  633:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(SrcDir),
  634:     compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir).
  635: 
  636: compile_files([File | Files], SrcDir, OutDir) ->
  637:     case filename:extension(File) of
  638: 	".erl" ->
  639: 	    AbsFile = filename:join([SrcDir, File]),
  640: 	    case compile:file(AbsFile, [{outdir, OutDir},report_errors]) of
  641: 		{ok, _Mod} ->
  642: 		    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir);
  643: 		Error ->
  644: 		    {compilation_error, AbsFile, OutDir, Error}
  645: 	    end;
  646: 	_ ->
  647: 	    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir)
  648:     end;
  649: compile_files([], _, _) ->
  650:     ok.
  651: 
  652: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  653: 
  654: epp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  655:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  656:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  657:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_epp 5",
  658: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
  659:     ok.
  660: 
  661: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  662: 
  663: %% Archives in this test have the new (OTP 28) format.
  664: create_and_extract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  665:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  666:      EmuArg, Source,
  667:      ErlFile, ErlCode,
  668:      _BeamFile, BeamCode} =
  669: 	prepare_creation("create_and_extract", Config),
  670: 
  671:     Bodies =
  672: 	[[{source, ErlCode}],
  673: 	 [{beam, BeamCode}],
  674: 	 [{modules, [BeamCode]},
  675:           {files, [{filename:basename(ErlFile), ErlCode}]}]],
  676: 
  677:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts with shebangs
  678:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  679: 	S <- [[{shebang, default}],
  680: 	      [{shebang, "/usr/bin/env     escript"}]],
  681: 	C <- [[],
  682: 	      [{comment, undefined}],
  683: 	      [{comment, default}],
  684: 	      [{comment, "This is a nonsense comment"}]],
  685: 	E <- [[],
  686: 	      [{emu_args, undefined}],
  687: 	      [{emu_args, EmuArg}]],
  688: 	B <- [[{source, Source}] | Bodies]],
  689: 
  690:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts without shebangs
  691:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  692: 	S <- [[], [{shebang, undefined}]],
  693: 	C <- [[], [{comment, undefined}]],
  694: 	E <- [[], [{emu_args, undefined}]],
  695: 	B <- Bodies],
  696: 
  697:     %% Verify the compile_source option
  698:     file:delete(NewFile),
  699:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{source, Source}]),
  700:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, Source}]} = escript:extract(NewFile, []),
  701:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, BeamCode2}]} =
  702: 	escript:extract(NewFile, [compile_source]),
  703:     verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo,
  704: 		    [{shebang, default},
  705: 		     {comment, default},
  706: 		     {beam, BeamCode2}]),
  707: 
  708:     file:delete(NewFile),
  709:     ok.
  710: 
  711: prepare_creation(Base, Config) ->
  712:     %% Read the source
  713:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  714:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  715:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir,"emulator_flags"]),
  716:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  717:     NewFile = filename:join([PrivDir, Base]),
  718:     {ok, [{shebang, default},
  719: 	  {comment, _},
  720: 	  {emu_args, EmuArg},
  721: 	  {source, Source}]} =
  722: 	escript:extract(OrigFile, []),
  723: 
  724:     %% Compile the code
  725:     ErlFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  726:     ErlCode = list_to_binary(["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  727: 			      "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  728: 			      Source, "\n\n"]),
  729:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  730: 
  731:     %% Compile the code
  732:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  733: 	compile:file(ErlFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  734: 
  735:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  736:      EmuArg, Source,
  737:      ErlFile, ErlCode,
  738:      NewFile ++ ".beam", BeamCode}.
  739: 
  740: verify_sections(Config, File, FileInfo, Sections) ->
  741:     %% io:format("~p:verify_sections(\n\t~p,\n\t~p,\n\t~p).\n",
  742:     %%           [?MODULE, File, FileInfo, Sections]),
  743: 
  744:     %% Create
  745:     file:delete(File),
  746:     ok = escript:create(File, Sections),
  747:     ok = file:write_file_info(File, FileInfo),
  748: 
  749:     %% Run
  750:     Dir = filename:absname(filename:dirname(File)),
  751:     Base = filename:basename(File),
  752: 
  753:     HasArg = fun(Tag) ->
  754: 		     case lists:keysearch(Tag, 1, Sections) of
  755: 			 false -> false;
  756: 			 {value, {_, undefined}} -> false;
  757: 			 {value, _} -> true
  758: 		     end
  759: 	     end,
  760:     ExpectedMain = <<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n">>,
  761:     ExpectedOutput =
  762: 	case HasArg(emu_args) of
  763: 	    true ->
  764: 		<<"nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  765: 		  "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  766: 		  "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  767: 		  "unknown:[]\n"
  768: 		  "ExitCode:0">>;
  769: 	    false ->
  770: 		<<"nostick:[]\nmnesia:[]\nERL_FLAGS=false\nunknown:[]\nExitCode:0">>
  771: 	end,
  772: 
  773:     InputArgs = Base ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  774:     Expected = <<ExpectedMain/binary, ExpectedOutput/binary>>,
  775:     case HasArg(shebang) of
  776: 	true ->
  777: 	    run(Config, Dir, InputArgs, [Expected]);
  778: 	false ->
  779: 	    run_with_opts(Config, Dir, [], InputArgs, [Expected])
  780:     end,
  781: 
  782:     %% Verify
  783:     {ok, Bin} = escript:create(binary, Sections),
  784:     {ok, Read} = file:read_file(File),
  785:     Bin = Read, % Assert
  786: 
  787:     Normalized = normalize_sections(Sections),
  788:     {ok, Extracted} = escript:extract(File, []),
  789:     %% io:format("Normalized: ~p\n", [Normalized]),
  790:     %% io:format("Extracted:  ~p\n", [Extracted]),
  791:     ?assertEqual(Normalized, Extracted),
  792:     ok.
  793: 
  794: normalize_sections(Sections) ->
  795:     AtomToTuple =
  796: 	fun(Val) ->
  797: 		if
  798: 		    is_atom(Val) -> {Val, default};
  799: 		    true -> Val
  800: 		end
  801: 	end,
  802:     case lists:map(AtomToTuple, [{K, V} || {K, V} <- Sections, V =/= undefined]) of
  803: 	[{shebang, Shebang} | Rest] ->
  804: 	    [{shebang, Shebang} |
  805: 	     case Rest of
  806: 		 [{comment, Comment} | Rest2] ->
  807: 		     [{comment, Comment} |
  808: 		      case Rest2 of
  809:                           [{emu_args, _} | _]=Body ->
  810:                               Body;
  811:                           [{modules, _} | _]=Body ->
  812:                               [{emu_args, undefined} | Body];
  813: 			  [Body] ->
  814: 			      [{emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  815: 		      end
  816: 		     ];
  817:                  [{emu_args, _}, {modules, _} | _]=Rest2 ->
  818:                      [{comment, undefined} | Rest2];
  819: 		 [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  820: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  821:                  [{modules, _} | _]=Body ->
  822:                      [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined} | Body];
  823: 		 [Body] ->
  824: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  825: 	     end];
  826:         [{modules, _} | _]=Body ->
  827:             [{shebang, undefined}, {comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined} |
  828:              Body];
  829: 	[Body] ->
  830: 	    [{shebang, undefined}, {comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  831:     end.
  832: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  833: 
  834: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  835:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  836:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  837:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode1",
  838:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  839:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  840:            "called as <<224,170,170>> / <<224,170,170>>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  841:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode2",
  842:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  843:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  844:            "called as <<\"\xaa\">> / <<\"\xaa\">>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  845:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode3", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  846:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode4", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  847:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode5", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  848:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode6", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  849:     ok.
  850: 
  851: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  852: 
  853: overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  854:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  855:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  856:     run(Config, Dir, "arg_overflow",
  857: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  858:     run(Config, Dir, "linebuf_overflow",
  859: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  860:     ok.
  861: 
  862: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  863: 
  864: %% OTP-16006, ERL-992
  865: bad_io_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  866:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  867:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  868:     run(Config, Dir, "bad_io_server",
  869:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  870:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  871:            "called as '\\x{400}' / 0\nExitCode:127">>]),
  872:     ok.
  873: 
  874: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  875: 
  876: bypass_unicode_conversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  877:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  878:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  879:     ToNull = case os:type() of
  880:         {win32,_} -> " 1> nul ";
  881:         _ -> " 1> /dev/null "
  882:     end,
  883:     Cmd = fun(Enc) -> "bypass_unicode_conversion "++atom_to_list(Enc)++ToNull end,
  884:     {TimeLatin1, _} = timer:tc(
  885:         fun() -> run(Config, Dir, Cmd(latin1), [<<"ExitCode:0">>]) end),
  886:     {TimeUnicode, _} = timer:tc(
  887:         fun() -> run(Config, Dir, Cmd(unicode), [<<"ExitCode:0">>]) end),
  888:     %% Check that Time(latin1) is about the same as Time(unicode)
  889:     %% Without the bypass, the time difference would be about 5x.
  890:     %% Turns out that the timing might be a bit unstable, so we allow a 2x difference.
  891:     io:format("Time(latin1) = ~p ~~= Time(unicode) = ~p~n", [TimeLatin1, TimeUnicode]),
  892:     true = TimeLatin1 =< TimeUnicode * 2,
  893:     ok.
  894: 
  895: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  896: 
  897: run(Config, Dir, Cmd, Expected) ->
  898:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", Cmd, Expected).
  899: 
  900: run_with_opts(Config, Dir, Opts, Cmd0, Expected) ->
  901:     [CmdName | _] = string:split(Cmd0, " ", all),
  902:     Cmd = case os:type() of
  903: 	      {win32,Wtype} ->
  904:                   %% This case is stolen from os:mk_cmd/2
  905:                   Command = case {os:getenv("COMSPEC"),Wtype} of
  906:                                 {false,windows} -> "command.com /c ";
  907:                                 {false,_} -> "cmd /c ";
  908:                                 {Cspec,_} -> lists:concat([Cspec," /c "])
  909:                             end,
  910:                   Command ++ "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ filename:nativename(Dir) ++ "\\" ++ Cmd0;
  911: 	      _ -> "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ Dir ++ "/" ++ Cmd0
  912: 	  end,
  913:     do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd, Expected).
  914: 
  915: do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd0, Expected0) ->
  916:     StdErrFile = tempnam(Config, CmdName),
  917:     Cmd = Cmd0 ++ " 2> " ++ filename:nativename(StdErrFile),
  918:     io:format("Run: ~ts\n", [Cmd]),
  919:     Expected = iolist_to_binary(expected_output(Expected0, Dir)),
  920: 
  921:     Env = [{"PATH",Dir++":"++os:getenv("PATH")},
  922:            {"ERL_FLAGS",false},{"ERL_AFLAGS",false}],
  923:     Port = open_port({spawn,Cmd}, [exit_status,eof,in,{env,Env},hide]),
  924:     StdOut = get_data(Port, []),
  925:     receive
  926: 	{Port,{exit_status,ExitCode}} ->
  927: 	    {ok, StdErr} = file:read_file(StdErrFile),
  928: 	    file:delete(StdErrFile),
  929: 	    Res = [StdErr, StdOut],
  930: 	    Actual = iolist_to_binary([Res,"ExitCode:"++integer_to_list(ExitCode)]),
  931: 	    case matches(Expected, Actual) of
  932: 		true ->
  933: 		    ok;
  934: 		false ->
  935: 		    io:format("Expected: ~ts\n", [Expected]),
  936: 		    io:format("Actual:   ~ts\n", [Actual]),
  937: 		    ct:fail(failed)
  938: 	    end
  939:     end.
  940: 
  941: %% Check if Expected and Actual contain the same lines.
  942: %% The lines may occur in different order.
  943: matches(Expected, Actual) ->
  944:     ExpectedLines = string:split(Expected, "\n", all),
  945:     ActualLines = string:split(Actual, "\n", all),
  946:     matches_1(ExpectedLines, ActualLines).
  947: 
  948: matches_1([], []) -> true;
  949: matches_1([Line | Expected], Actual0) ->
  950:     case delete_first(Line, Actual0) of
  951: 	false -> false;
  952: 	Actual -> matches_1(Expected, Actual)
  953:     end.
  954: 
  955: delete_first(X, L) -> delete_first(X, L, []).
  956: 
  957: delete_first(_X, [], _Acc) -> false;
  958: delete_first(X, [X | Tail], Acc) -> lists:reverse(Acc, Tail);
  959: delete_first(X, [Y | Tail], Acc) -> delete_first(X, Tail, [Y | Acc]).
  960: 
  961: tempnam(Config, Prefix) ->
  962:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  963:     File = filename:join(Dir, Prefix ++ ".stderr"),
  964:     case file:delete(File) of
  965: 	ok -> ok;
  966: 	{error, enoent} -> ok
  967:     end,
  968:     case file:open(File, [write, exclusive, raw]) of
  969: 	{ok, IoDev} ->
  970: 	    ok = file:close(IoDev),
  971: 	    ok = file:delete(File),
  972: 	    File;
  973: 	{error, Reason} ->
  974: 	    io:format("Failed to create ~s: ~p\n", [File, Reason]),
  975: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  976:     end.
  977: 
  978: get_data(Port, SoFar) ->
  979:     receive
  980: 	{Port,{data,Bytes}} ->
  981: 	    get_data(Port, [SoFar|Bytes]);
  982: 	{Port,eof} ->
  983: 	    erlang:port_close(Port),
  984: 	    SoFar
  985:     end.
  986: 
  987: expected_output([data_dir|T], Data) ->
  988:     Slash = case os:type() of
  989: 		{win32,_} -> "\\";
  990: 		_ -> "/"
  991: 	    end,
  992:     [filename:nativename(Data)++Slash|expected_output(T, Data)];
  993: expected_output([H|T], Data) ->
  994:     [H|expected_output(T, Data)];
  995: expected_output([], _) ->
  996:     [];
  997: expected_output(Bin, _) when is_binary(Bin) ->
  998:     Bin.
  999:
